abstract: The password for my Web-based mail account doesn’t work anymore and I can’t get into it. If it got hacked, what can I do?
snippet: The password for my Web-based mail account doesn’t work anymore and I can’t get into it. If it got hacked, what can I do?
lead_paragraph: Q. The password for my Web-based mail account doesn’t work anymore and I can’t get into it. If it got hacked, what can I do?

abstract: Gmail’s Forgotten Attachment Detector warns if your message mentions an attachment, but the service senses no files attached.
snippet: Gmail’s Forgotten Attachment Detector warns if your message mentions an attachment, but the service senses no files attached.
lead_paragraph: Gmail Labs has plenty of experimental features including the Forgotten Attachment Detector, which warns if your message mentions an attachment, but the service senses no files attached.

headline.main: Tip of the Week: Detecting Missing Attachments

abstract: For advertisers, Yahoo’s new platform would simplify the buying of display ads.
snippet: For advertisers, Yahoo’s new platform would simplify the buying of display ads.
lead_paragraph: Yahoo announced on Wednesday the details about its system to buy and sell display advertising online, with the hope that the company can dominate the display ad market in the same way Google steers the search market.

headline.main: Yahoo Overhauls System for Selling Display Ads
headline.print_headline: Yahoo Overhauls System For Selling Display Ads

abstract: Every major Web site has its own Search box and Search button. But usually, that Search function is not as good as Google.
snippet: Every major Web site has its own Search box and Search button. But usually, that Search function is not as good as Google.
lead_paragraph: Today's e-column is nothing but a computer tip, but it's a biggie. It seems obvious in retrospect, but I've got to tell you, it's totally rocked my world:

headline.main: The Mother of All Search Functions
headline.kicker: From the Desk of David Pogue

abstract: Acumen Fund, Google and Salesforce.com introduce new software to help foundations measure the impact of grants.
snippet: Acumen Fund, Google and Salesforce.com introduce new software to help foundations measure the impact of grants.
lead_paragraph: Just as venture capitalists measure a start-up’s financial performance to gauge the success of their investment, venture philanthropists — those who make grants using venture capital strategies — want to measure the impact of their charitable contributions.

headline.main: A New Tool for Venture Philanthropists
